meanings.definition: The main point or essence of something.
meanings.sent1: The gist of the story is that the hero saves the day.
meanings.sent2: Can you give me the gist of the movie plot?
meanings.sent3: I missed the gist of the joke, but everyone else laughed.
meanings.sent4: Her expression captured the gist of disappointment.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's explanation made the gist of the lesson crystal clear.

meanings.definition: To summarize or convey the main idea of something.
meanings.sent1: Please gist the article for me; I don't have time to read it all.
meanings.sent2: I will gist the meeting points in an email for everyone.
meanings.sent3: He tried to gist the complex theory in a simple way, but it was still confusing.
meanings.sent4: She quickly gisted the novel's plot in just a few sentences.
meanings.sent5: The infographic gisted the research findings effectively.
